article_title: The US health insurance market and medical travel: Separating fact from fiction

og.description: In the first of two articles on the US medical travel market, Irving Stackpole from Stackpole & Associates gives his view on the adoption of medical travel by US insurers and employers, and how the health insurance market is changing.
og.title: The US health insurance market and medical travel: Separating fact from fiction  | IMTJ

article_metadata.description: In the first of two articles on the US medical travel market, Irving Stackpole from Stackpole & Associates gives his view on the adoption of medical travel by US insurers and employers, and how the health insurance market is changing.
